name: Mistrz Polski Manager 96
overview: Mistrz Polski '96 is a football management game. The game allows the player to select one team from four Polish leagues. The game consists of 3 difficulty levels. The game covers national backyard only. The player as a manager decides on sponsors and ticket prize, footballers transfers, stadium facilities, composition of the team, planning tactics for each match and intensity of training. During the match all the interesting situations are presented in the form of video animation. The match commentary is limited to introducing the names of players receiving yellow or red cards and scoring a goal. The club's finances consist of revenues from tickets, transfers, advertising and expenditure on salaries, taxes, credit rates. An interesting feature is the opportunity to talk with the player. The game features historical information and team editor, allowing to change players or club name and colors of outfit.
